name: ICDeviceCapability
desc: Constants that describe the capabilities of a camera.

items.name: static let cameraDeviceCanTakePicture: ICDeviceCapability
items.desc: The capability for the client to request to take a picture while the camera is connected.

items.name: static let cameraDeviceCanTakePictureUsingShutterReleaseOnCamera: ICDeviceCapability
items.desc: The capability to capture a picture if the user presses the shutter release on the camera while the camera is connected.

items.name: static let cameraDeviceCanDeleteOneFile: ICDeviceCapability
items.desc: Indicates that the camera can delete a file at a time while it is connected.

items.name: static let cameraDeviceCanDeleteAllFiles: ICDeviceCapability
items.desc: Indicates that the camera can delete all files in a single operation while it is connected.

items.name: static let cameraDeviceCanReceiveFile: ICDeviceCapability
items.desc: Indicates that the host can upload files to the camera.

items.name: static let cameraDeviceCanSyncClock: ICDeviceCapability
items.desc: Indicates that the camera can synchronize its date and time with that of the host computer.

items.name: static let cameraDeviceCanAcceptPTPCommands: ICDeviceCapability
items.desc: Indicates that the camera can accept PTP commands.

items.name: static let canEjectOrDisconnect: ICDeviceCapability
items.desc: Indicates that the camera can eject or disconnect.
